Attributes.description: Dynamics and control of prokaryotic cellular processes in response to the biotic and abiotic environment including metabolic interactions and metabolic cooperation between microorganisms.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) one of MICB 211, MICB 201 and one of BIOL 201, BIOC 202, BIOC 203; or (b) BIOT 380.
